Blog.post: urlLink Solfusion playing live and basic at orchard paragon for the tapersy gig. urlLink
urlLink Set up and tune my guitar urlLink
urlLink This photo was taken by my photographer friend,Eric Ang. He wanted to enter this photo for some photography competition. urlLink

urlLink Solfusion performing at orchard cineleisure.Tapersy gig is a charity event to raise money for the poor students in school who needs pocket money.The solfusion demo CD was sold there and the profit of our CD was donated to the charity.Interesting thing is,after the gig,people who buy our CD requested us to sign our autograph at the CD.Thank you to all people who appreciated our music.keep on believeing. urlLink

urlLink Guitar heros of all time. urlLink

urlLink Steve vai is the most amazing guitarist I have ever seen.He is truely inspirational.Caught his concert in Singapore on the 29th of july 04 at Suntec conventional hall.The performance was totally mind blowing.Freakin super cool!!! urlLink
urlLink One ass kicking performance of all time urlLink
